channel.title: Wep Keys/router secruity
channel.description: Is there a way to get around it? I mean, i download slow, 30kbps slow. and there are people across the street from em with a good router that i get almost 100 percent wirerless over here. but they have a wep key. So is there a way to get around it?

item.title: Wep Keys/router secruity
item.dc:creator: @Exception Exception
item.description:
@Exception wrote:

Aircrack is definitely the one of the best wep key sniffers around. Depending on the strength of the key, and traffic on the router, it can take from a night to a week to crack. I’m not sure about the win32 build, but I know the Linux one is very stable. I’ve cracked a 128bit encrypted key in 3 days

Read full topic

item.title: Wep Keys/router secruity
item.dc:creator: @davidude36 Brolapse
item.description:
@davidude36 wrote:

There are so many routers around my school with passwords on their routers. Being able to use the internet at school on my laptop would be so awesome… will look at the link posted above.

Read full topic

item.title: Wep Keys/router secruity
item.dc:creator: @The_Un-Named The Un-Named
item.description:
@The_Un-Named wrote:

In the UK, this is illegal. Sure, if you know them you can smooth it over, but if they keep logs, all they need to do is phone the police and you can get in some serious trouble.

However, if you get in an unprotected one, still illegal, you can modify their router settings not to log stuff so you can get in without trace.

Read full topic
